metadata.Title: CVE-2019-6788 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in GitLab Community and Enterprise Edition before 11.5.8, 11.6.x before 11.6.6, and 11.7.x before 11.7.1. It allows Information Disclosure (issue 3 of 6). For installations using GitHub or Bitbucket OAuth integrations, it is possible to use a covert redirect to obtain the user OAuth token for those services.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
